Introduction
============

AMQP_ wrapper over marcxml2mods_ for the E-deposit_ project.

.. _AMQP: https://www.amqp.org/
.. _marcxml2mods: https://github.com/edeposit/marcxml2mods
.. _E-deposit: http://edeposit.nkp.cz/
